[High-dose antipsychotics place children at increased risk of unexpected death](https://news.vumc.org/2018/12/12/high-dose-antipsychotics-place-children-at-increased-risk-of-unexpected-death/) Dec. 12, 2018—Children and young adults without psychosis who are prescribed high-dose antipsychotic medications are at increased risk of unexpected death, despite the availability of other medications to treat their conditions, according to a Vanderbilt University Medical Center study published today in JAMA Psychiatry.
